page.title: 16COMMUTING SURVEY,WEST MERSEA
page.content: Most people who live in West Mersea have to travel off the island to get to work. This is because there are no big factories or industries in West- Mersea. As you can imagine there are very few jobs and you are very lucky if you manage to get a job on the island. To give you an idea of people who commute to work,we did a survey to show this. We went to four junior classes and questioned the pupils.Very few hands were down when we asked "How many parents went off the Island to go to work". We found out that all together in all 4 classes, there were 62 people who work off the Island, and 35 who work on the Island. We think that the people who work off the Island travel to places like Colchester, Chelmsford and Ipswich, every day. Some even commute to London.
